refnamediv.refpurpose: get contents of a file as a string output stream

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns a string output stream initialized to contain the text of the file or its segment, on local file system path relative to the server's working directory.
file_to_string_output can handle longer files than file_to_string and the resulting string output, if too long to be converted into a varchar, can be stored inside a blob.
Access controls in the server configuration file apply. An attempt to access a file in a directory where access is not explicitly allowed will signal an error.

refsect2.title: file
refsect2.para: a varchar path relative to server's working directory.

refsect2.title: from
refsect2.para: an optional integer byte offset of the start of the segment to extract. Defaults to 0.

refsect2.title: to
refsect2.para: an optional integer byte offset of the end of the requested segment. Defaults to file length.

example.title: Insert file contents into a table
example.para: This example shows how to insert file contents into a table file_table with two columns.
